title: Saint George's Day
summary: Saint George's Day, also called the Feast of Saint George, is the feast day of Saint George as  celebrated by various Christian Churches and by the several nations, old kingdoms, regions, states, countries and cities of which Saint George is the patron saint - including Bulgaria, England, Georgia, Portugal, as well as the Spanish communities of CÃ¡ceres, Alcoy, Aragon and Catalonia. The saint also has his state holiday in Rio de Janeiro, Brazil.[1]
